list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an agency or means of doing something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: using the latest technology as a medium for job creation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sử dụng công nghệ mới nhất như một phương tiện để tạo việc làm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the intervening substance through which impressions are conveyed to the senses or a force acts on objects at a distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: radio communication needs no physical medium between the two stations
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giao tiếp vô tuyến không cần phương tiện vật lý giữa hai trạm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular form of storage for digitized information, such as magnetic tape or discs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: moving or copying backed-up data through a hierarchy of different mediums
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: di chuyển hoặc sao chép dữ liệu sao lưu thông qua một hệ thống phân cấp của các phương tiện khác nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the material or form used by an artist, composer, or writer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: oil paint is the most popular medium for glazing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sơn dầu là phương tiện phổ biến nhất để tráng men

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person claiming to be in contact with the spirits of the dead and to communicate between the dead and the living.
the middle quality or state between two extremes; a reasonable balance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there is a medium between being modest and boastful
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một phương tiện giữa sự khiêm tốn và khoe khoang

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: about halfway between two extremes of size or another quality; average.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: John is six feet tall, of medium build
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: John cao sáu feet, của khu vực trung bình
